text: waqal aladhin kfru: ln nsddiq bhdha alquran wala bialadhi taqaddamah min altawrat wal'iinjil walzbwr, faqad kdhdhabu bjmye kutib allh. walaw taraa -ayha alrswl- 'iidh alzaalimun mhbwswn eind rabihim llhsab, ytrajewn alkalam fima bynhm, kl yulqy baletab ealaa alakhr, lrayt shyyana fzyea, yaqul almstdefwn liladhin astakbaruu -whm alqadat walrwsa' aldaaluwn almdlwn-: lawla 'antum adlltmwna ean alhudaa lakunaa muminin biallah wrswlh
